text: Tony Ries Jr. (born 27 September 1939) is a South African wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle lightweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:South African male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of South Africa Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Johannesburg
title: Tony Ries Jr.
